attributes.action: The public do not agree on immigration policies by government & MP's or amnesty.
attributes.background: The UK is over-run with illegals roaming our streets in excess of 700k of them & are making streets "unsafe" & our MP's are demonstrating how far apart they are from our views & the nation demands that no immigration "amnesty" be implemented & we demand a strong fair immigration policy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
